name: Kymera Therapeutics
description:
Kymera Therapeutics is pioneering targeted protein degradation (TPD) 
to address diseases driven by high-value, previously undruggable targets. Their platform 
uses small molecules (degraders) that can eliminate disease-causing proteins rather than 
just inhibiting them, potentially offering biologics-like efficacy in an oral pill.

Key differentiators:
- Industry leader in developing oral degrader medicines
- Focus on historically undrugged transcription factors (STAT6, IRF5)
- Deep expertise in target-drug interplay across tissues and cell types
- Building a fully integrated global immunology company

partnerships.notes: Sanofi to advance KT-485 into Phase 1 in 2026

partnerships.value: Up to $750M total payments ($85M upfront + option)
partnerships.notes: Kymera leads research; Gilead has option for development/commercialization

STAT6.name: STAT6
STAT6.full_name: Signal Transducer and Activator of Transcription 6

validation.genetic: STAT6 GoF and heterozygous LoF alleles validate role in Type 2 inflammation
validation.clinical: IL-4/IL-13 pathway validated by Dupixent across AD, asthma, COPD, EoE, CRSwNP, CSU, PN, BP

STAT6.why_undrugged: Transcription factors historically undruggable by traditional small molecules; no oral drugs selectively target this pathway

IRF5.name: IRF5
IRF5.pathway: TLR/MyD88 → Type I IFN + pro-inflammatory cytokines

validation.genetic: GWAS identifies IRF5 as autoimmune susceptibility gene for SLE, Sjögren's, RA, IBD, SSc
validation.clinical: IRF5-regulated pathways validated by anti-IFN, anti-TNF, IL-6, IL-12/23 antibodies

IRF5.why_undrugged: Multiple activation steps and IRF family member homology make selective inhibition impossible; degradation is only approach

IRAK4.name: IRAK4

validation.genetic: IRAK4 null humans are healthy - validates safety of complete inhibition
validation.clinical: IL-1/IL-18/IL-33/IL-36 pathways validated across RA, HS, AD, asthma, COPD, GPP

IRAK4.why_degrader_better: Kinase inhibitors only block catalytic function; degraders eliminate scaffolding function too for complete pathway blockade
